panels.description: The rate of the committed round number.
panels.title: Committed blocks per sec

panels.description: The rate of the committed transaction version.
panels.title: Committed successful txns per sec

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the leader signs it.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="signed"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to signed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node receives it in consensus.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="received"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="received"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to receive

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node is synced and ready to execute.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="synced"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="synced"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to synced

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node executes the block.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="executed"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to executed

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node votes for it.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="voted"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="voted"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to vote

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the QC is aggregated by leader.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_aggregated"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_aggregated"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to QC aggregated

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node adds the QC.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_added"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="qc_added"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to QC received

panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment the node commits it.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_block_tracing_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="committed"}[$interval])

panels.title: Block creation to commit

panels.description: Percent of time the main Event Loop spends idle

targets.expr: 1 - (rate(consensus_duration_sum{op='process_block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) + on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{op='process_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) + on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_local_timeout', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Event Loop Idle

panels.description: Percent of time the main Event Loop spends for block retrieval

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Event Loop process consensus msg

panels.description: Percent of time the main Event Loop spends for block retrieval

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_block_retrieval', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Event Loop process block retrieval

panels.description: Percent of time the main loop spends for processing local timeout.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_local_timeout', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time process local timeout

panels.description: Percent time spent in process proposal compared to all consensus msg

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_proposal', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_message',  kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Process proposal

panels.description: Percent time spent in process vote compared to all consensus msg

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_vote', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Process vote

panels.description: Percent time spent in process sync info compared to all consensus msg

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_sync_info', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on(kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='process_message', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Percent Time Process sync info

panels.description: The error rate of main loop (timeout is considered as error)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='main_loop', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Main Event Loop Error rate

panels.description: A sampled binary number indicating whether the node is currently in a function. (Useful when the node is stuck somewhere)
panels.title: Main Event Loop Current running function

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.
panels.title: Current Round

panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.
panels.title: Total timeout rounds

panels.description: The total number a single node has timeout locally. When 2f+1 nodes have local timeout for the same round, a timeout round is formed.
panels.title: Total local timeout

panels.description: The duration of a single round until it generates local timeout.
panels.title: Current Round timeout value

panels.description: The current epoch number the node is in, the number is bumped with reconfiguration event like key rotation, validator set change etc.
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Number of validators for the current epoch.
panels.title: Number of validators

panels.description: Pending blocks in the block tree, typically it should be less than 3.
panels.title: Pending blocks

panels.description: The average number of transactions of a block, can impact the execution time and overall latency.
panels.title: Transactions per block

panels.description: Total time the node has to wait before inserting the block
panels.title: Total wait duration

panels.description: The average time to execute a block.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='execute_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='execute_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Execute block Latency

panels.description: The average time to commit blocks (may commit more than 1 in a single call).

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='commit_block', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='commit_block',  kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Commit block Latency

panels.description: The average latency of talking to safety rules (of all calls).

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='safety_rules', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='safety_rules', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Safety rules Latency

panels.description: The average latency of pulling the txn from mempool.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='pull_txn', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='pull_txn', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Pull txn Latency

panels.description: The average latency of notifying mempool about failed transactions.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_mempool', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_mempool', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Notify mempool Latency

panels.description: The average latency of notifying state sync of committed txn.

targets.expr: rate(consensus_duration_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_state_sync', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", op='notify_state_sync', kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Notify state sync Latency

panels.description: The total count of call to sync to.
panels.title: State sync count

panels.description: The total time spent in the external sync_to function.
panels.title: Total time spent on state sync

panels.description: The total number of sync info msg sent to help peers.
panels.title: Total sync Info Msgs sent to help peers

panels.description: The total number of block retrieval the node sends. It's required when the node is missing some ancestors of the block to be executed.
panels.title: Block retrieval count

panels.description: Total time spent in retrieval the blocks from peers. (This is blocking RPC call)
panels.title: Total time spent on block retrieval

panels.description: The proposal rate of the node, indicating how many times it becomes leaders.
panels.title: Proposals rate

panels.description: The total number the node votes on a NIL block when the round timeout. (when the proposer doesn't send proposal in time).
panels.title: Total votes on Nil

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) aptos_consensus_pending_network_events{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Network -> Consensus Pending Messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to network layer to consensus.
panels.title: Network -> Consensus Dropped Messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus block retrieval (dedicated channel for the rpc).

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) aptos_consensus_block_retrieval_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Consensus -> Main loop (Block retrieval) Pending Messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus block retrieval (dedicated channel for the rpc).
panels.title: Consensus -> Main loop (Block retrieval) Dropped Messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{state="enqueued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dequeued", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - on (kubernetes_pod_name, role) aptos_consensus_channel_msgs_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", state="dropped", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Consensus -> Main loop (Consensus Msg) Pending Messages

panels.description: The channel metrics related to consensus network -> main loop. (It only keeps one message per peer per type).
panels.title: Consensus -> Main loop (Consensus Msg) Dropped Messages

panels.description: The pending messages in the self message queue (for proposal and vote) and timeout queue (for local timeout).
panels.title: Pending self message

panels.description: The pending messages in the self message queue (for proposal and vote) and timeout queue (for local timeout).
panels.title: Pending round local timeouts
